subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The etiquette of free agency may have been violated when Jordan decided to stay with the Clippers instead of signing with the Mavericks, but no actual contract or N.B.A. rule was broken.
snippet: The etiquette of free agency may have been violated when Jordan decided to stay with the Clippers instead of signing with the Mavericks, but no actual contract or N.B.A. rule was broken.
